mapper.select: select distinct comptition.name as competitionname, comptition.fnumber, compititor.name as competitorname , compititor.fnumber as compititorfnumber, course.name as coursename, course.weight as cweight, course.fid as cfid from Cmpt_dtalJudges inner join Cmpt_dtalCompetitor on Cmpt_dtalJudges.competition=Cmpt_dtalCompetitor.competition inner join comptition on comptition.fnumber=Cmpt_dtalJudges.competition inner join compititor on compititor.fnumber=Cmpt_dtalCompetitor.competitor inner join Judges on judges.fnumber=Cmpt_dtalJudges.judges inner join course on course.fnumber=Cmpt_dtalJudges.course where Cmpt_dtalJudges.judges=#{judges};
mapper.insert:
insert into scoring(cmpt_fid, judges, compititor, course, grade ) values
( #{item.cmpt_fid}, #{item.judges}, #{item.compititor}, #{item.course}, #{item.grade} )
mapper.select: select compititor.name competitorname, comptition.name competitionname, avg(grade) , compititor.fnumber fnumber from scoring inner join comptition on comptition.fnumber=scoring.cmpt_fid inner join compititor on compititor.fnumber=scoring.compititor where judges=#{judges} group by compititor.name, comptition.name
